4. Downloads¶

4.1. Binary Package¶

The CLEED package is available in the following pre-made packages:

File Package type Operating System
../build/CLEED-2014.05.19-win32.exe Win32 Installer Windows Vista/7/8
../build/CLEED-2014.05.19-win32.zip Win32 Zip Archive Windows Vista/7/8
../build/CLEED-2014.05.19-win32.zip Source  

4.2. Source Package¶

If you wish to compile CLEED yourself, then please download the source package from ..
